messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] unschooling & daycare
messages.msgSnippet: Harmony wrote: What I am looking for may not be unschooling by your definition, I want a relaxed fun atmosphere where children are treated as individuals and
messages.messageBody:
Harmony wrote:

What I am looking for may not be unschooling by your definition, I
want a relaxed fun atmosphere where children are treated as individuals
and have
choices in what they do and how they do it. Has anyone ever done that
with a
large group of kids? If not, I will just keep doing what I am doing
and trying
different suggestions that I get.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Try here:

http://www.liveandlearnconference.org/funshops

We're expecting over 300 children this year.

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
